hero.title: Reimagining Agriculture with {appName}
hero.subtitle: Connecting the entire agricultural value chain, from seed to sale, with tools for traceability, trade, and trust.

features.title: A Unified Platform for All Stakeholders
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides an integrated suite of tools to empower every participant in the agricultural ecosystem.

networking.title: Professional Networking
networking.description: Connect with farmers, buyers, suppliers, and experts to build your professional network.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment with trust and transparency.

forums.title: Knowledge Sharing
forums.description: Join community discussions, share insights, and learn from experts in the field.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Find or offer specialized agricultural services, from agronomy to equipment operation.

forWho.title: Built for the Entire Agri-Supply Chain
forWho.description: Whether you're a smallholder farmer, a large-scale buyer, or an agronomy expert, DamDoh has tools to help you succeed.
forWho.imageAlt: A collage of diverse agricultural stakeholders using the DamDoh platform.

farmers.title: For Farmers
farmers.description: Access markets, manage your farm, and get expert advice to improve your yield and income.

buyers.title: For Buyers & Businesses
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and streamline your supply chain.

experts.title: For Experts & Service Providers

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution

hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Prosperity
hero.subtitle: We are on a mission to digitize and connect the global agricultural supply chain, empowering every stakeholder from the soil to the shelf.

vision.title: Our Vision for a Connected Future
vision.p1: DamDoh was born from a simple yet powerful idea: that technology can bridge the gaps in the agricultural world. We envision a world where smallholder farmers have direct access to global markets, where buyers can source produce with verifiable trust, and where knowledge flows freely to create a more sustainable and equitable food system.
vision.p2: We are more than just a platform; we are a community dedicated to solving real-world challenges with innovative, user-centric solutions.

challenge.title: The Fragmented Landscape of Agriculture
challenge.description: The agricultural supply chain is complex and often disconnected, presenting numerous challenges for everyone involved.

list.knowledge: Information Gaps: Farmers lack access to modern techniques and real-time market data.
list.market: Market Access: Smallholders struggle to connect with larger, more profitable markets.
list.quality: Quality & Trust: Buyers face uncertainty about produce quality, origin, and farming practices.
list.logistics: Inefficient Logistics: Poor coordination leads to high costs and significant post-harvest losses.
list.financial: Financial Exclusion: Lack of formal records prevents access to credit and insurance.
list.climate: Climate Change: Increasing unpredictability requires more resilient farming systems.
list.informal: Informal Economy: A lack of digital records hinders growth and formalization.

solution.title: The DamDoh Solution: An Integrated Ecosystem
solution.description: We tackle these challenges by providing a single, unified platform with tools for everyone.

p2p.title: Peer-to-Peer
p2p.content: Farmers connecting with other farmers to share knowledge and form cooperatives.

p2b.title: Producer-to-Business
p2b.content: Direct links between farmers and buyers, processors, and exporters, cutting out unnecessary middlemen.

p2e.title: Producer-to-Expert
p2e.content: Access to agronomists, financial advisors, and logistics providers to improve operations.

p2w.title: Producer-to-World
p2w.content: Enabling smallholder farmers to participate in the global marketplace with trust and transparency.

commitment.title: Join Our Growing Ecosystem
commitment.p1: Our commitment is to the people who feed the world. By providing the digital tools they need, we believe we can foster a more resilient, profitable, and sustainable agricultural sector for generations to come.
commitment.p2: Whether you're planting a seed, buying in bulk, or financing a farm, you have a place in the DamDoh community.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account with the help of a trusted friend.

recoverPage.step2: Show the generated QR code to a trusted friend who also uses DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code with their app to confirm your identity.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted connection in your DamDoh network scan this QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and will expire in 10 minutes.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or are interested in a partnership, here's how to reach our team.

sendMessage.title: Send us a Message
sendMessage.note: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy notice for DamDoh describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ('process') your information when you use our services ('Services'), such as when you visit our website at http://damdoh.org, or any website of ours that links to this privacy notice; engage with us in other related ways, including any sales, marketing, or events.

whatInfoWeCollect.heading: 1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
whatInfoWeCollect.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.

howWeUseInfo.heading: 2. HOW DO WE PROCESS YOUR INFORMATION?
howWeUseInfo.content: We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent.

willInfoBeShared.heading: 3. WHEN AND WITH WHOM DO WE SHARE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
willInfoBeShared.content: We may share information in specific situations and with specific third parties. Your information may be shared with our business partners, affiliates, and service providers to facilitate our Services.

cookiesAndTracking.heading: 4. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
cookiesAndTracking.content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies (like web beacons and pixels) to access or store information.

howLongWeKeepInfo.heading: 5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
howLongWeKeepInfo.content: We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.

howWeKeepInfoSafe.heading: 6. HOW DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION SAFE?
howWeKeepInfoSafe.content: We have implemented appropriate and reasonable technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process.

minors.heading: 7. DO WE COLLECT INFORMATION FROM MINORS?
minors.content: We do not knowingly collect data from or market to children under 18 years of age.

privacyRights.heading: 8. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
privacyRights.content: You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time. Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information under applicable data protection laws.

controlsForDoNotTrack.heading: 9. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
controlsForDoNotTrack.content: Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track ('DNT') feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. We do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online.

updatesToNotice.heading: 10. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
updatesToNotice.content: Yes, we will update this notice as necessary to stay compliant with relevant laws.

contactUs.heading: 11. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
contactUs.content: If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may contact us by post at: DamDoh, 123 Agri-Tech Avenue, Nairobi, Kenya.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to DamDoh. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of the DamDoh website and services ('Services'), provided by DamDoh Inc. By using our Services, you agree to these Terms. Please read them carefully.

agreementToTerms.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Services.

intellectualProperty.heading: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The Services and their original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DamDoh and its licensors. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of DamDoh.

userRepresentations.heading: 3. User Representations
userRepresentations.content: By using the Services, you represent and warrant that: (1) all registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete; (2) you will maintain the accuracy of such information and promptly update such registration information as necessary; (3) you have the legal capacity and you agree to comply with these Terms of Use; (4) you are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside; (5) you will not access the Site through automated or non-human means, whether through a bot, script, or otherwise; (6) you will not use the Site for any illegal or unauthorized purpose; and (7) your use of the Site will not violate any applicable law or regulation.

prohibitedActivities.heading: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: You may not access or use the Site for any purpose other than that for which we make the Site available. The Site may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us.

platformManagement.heading: 5. Platform Management
platformManagement.content: We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to: (1) monitor the Site for violations of these Terms of Use; (2) take appropriate legal action against anyone who, in our sole discretion, violates the law or these Terms of Use; (3) in our sole discretion and without limitation, refuse, restrict access to, limit the availability of, or disable any of your Contributions or any portion thereof.

termAndTermination.heading: 6. Term and Termination
termAndTermination.content: These Terms of Use shall remain in full force and effect while you use the Site. WITHOUT LIMITING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF THESE TERMS OF USE, WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO, IN OUR SOLE DISCRETION AND WITHOUT NOTICE OR LIABILITY, DENY ACCESS TO AND USE OF THE SITE (INCLUDING BLOCKING CERTAIN IP ADDRESSES), TO ANY PERSON FOR ANY REASON OR FOR NO REASON.

modificationsAndInterruptions.heading: 7. Modifications and Interruptions
modificationsAndInterruptions.content: We reserve the right to change, modify, or remove the contents of the Site at any time or for any reason at our sole discretion without notice. We also reserve the right to modify or discontinue all or part of the Site without notice at any time. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the Site.

governingLaw.heading: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Use and your use of the Site are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where DamDoh is established, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

disputeResolution.heading: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: Any legal action of whatever nature brought by either you or us shall be commenced or prosecuted in the state and federal courts located in our jurisdiction, and the parties hereby consent to, and waive all defenses of lack of personal jurisdiction and forum non conveniens with respect to venue and jurisdiction in such state and federal courts.

contactUs.heading: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: In order to resolve a complaint regarding the Site or to receive further information regarding use of the Site, please contact us.

termsOfService.conclusion: You can do so via our {contactLink} page.

careers.title: Careers at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: Join us in our mission to revolutionize the agricultural supply chain.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, we are a passionate, diverse team of innovators, agricultural experts, and technologists dedicated to making a tangible impact. We believe in:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: Meaningful Work: Your contributions will directly empower farmers and create a more sustainable food system.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Innovation: We tackle complex challenges with cutting-edge technology and creative thinking.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: Growth: We invest in our people, offering opportunities for professional development and learning.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: Collaboration: We foster a supportive, collaborative environment where every voice is heard.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: Global Impact: Be part of a solution that addresses global food security and economic development.

noOpenings.title: No Open Positions At The Moment
noOpenings.content1: We are always on the lookout for passionate talent. If you believe in our mission and think you can contribute, please feel free to send your resume and a cover letter to {emailLink}.

job1.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Node.js, Firestore)
job1.description: Design and build scalable microservices, manage our database architecture, and ensure the reliability of our platform's core functionalities.

job2.title: Lead Agronomist & Field Operations Manager
job2.description: Lead our team of field agents, provide expert agronomic advice, and ensure data integrity from our network of partner farms.

job3.title: Product Manager, Financial Services
job3.description: Drive the strategy and development of our financial products, including credit scoring, loans, and insurance integrations for smallholder farmers.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Fostering a professional, respectful, and trustworthy environment for all.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! Our mission is to connect the agricultural world in a positive and productive way. To ensure everyone has a great experience, we ask that you follow these guidelines:

respectful.title: Be Respectful and Professional
respectful.description: Treat all members with courtesy. We do not tolerate harassment, hate speech, or personal attacks. Engage in constructive discussions, even when you disagree.

authentic.title: Be Authentic and Honest
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your business truthfully. Do not impersonate others or provide misleading information about your products, services, or credentials.

relevant.title: Keep it Relevant
relevant.description: Contribute to discussions with relevant insights. Avoid spam, excessive self-promotion, and off-topic content in professional forums and marketplace listings.

fairTrade.title: Honor Your Commitments
fairTrade.description: Conduct business transactions with integrity. Fulfill your orders, pay on time, and communicate clearly to build lasting, trustworthy relationships.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainable Practices
sustainable.description: We encourage the sharing of knowledge and practices that support environmental, economic, and social sustainability in agriculture.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our team. You can send details to {emailLink}.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: By using DamDoh, you agree to these guidelines. We reserve the right to remove content and take action on accounts that violate these principles. Thank you for helping us build a positive community!

pinboardPage.comingSoonDescription: Imagine being able to pin interesting marketplace listings, insightful forum posts, valuable contacts, and useful articles all in one place. That's what the Pinboard will do!

industryNewsPage.title: Industry News & Insights
industryNewsPage.description: Stay informed with the latest trends, research, and policy changes affecting the global agricultural supply chain.

noNews.title: No News Available
noNews.description: Check back later for the latest industry updates and reports.

news1.title: Global Coffee Prices Surge Amidst Weather Concerns in Key Growing Regions
news1.excerpt: Futures for Arabica coffee have reached an 18-month high as droughts in Brazil and unexpected frosts in Vietnam threaten global supply.

news2.title: EU Implements New 'Farm to Fork' Packaging Regulations
news2.excerpt: New regulations effective this quarter mandate that all fresh produce imported into the European Union must use packaging made from at least 30% recycled materials.

news3.title: Study Shows Regenerative Agriculture Practices Can Sequester Up to 2 Tons of Carbon Per Hectare Annually
news3.excerpt: A decade-long study published in 'Nature Sustainability' provides compelling evidence that no-till farming and cover cropping significantly improve soil carbon levels.
